name: Maximum Thrust
description:
Maximum Thrust is an "Asteroids-Like" arcade action shooter, where you control a little green triangle destroying purple triangles and completing goals. With every "goal" you complete you unlock a new power uP, and eventually you'll be unstoppable... or at least very slightly unstoppable

Left Mouse Button - Moving

Right Mouse Button - Shooting

F12 - ScreenShot

SpaceBar and Middle Mouse - Bring up the Select Mission Menu

C - Quit Mission

1-8 - Removes Power Up in that slot, top left being slot 1, bottom right being slot 8. PowerUp icons are in the bottom left.

Escape - Bring up the Menu

F11 - Fullscreen Toggle
